text:
Milena Dravić (;; 5 October 1940 – 14 October 2018) was a Serbian actress and dancer. She was born in Belgrade. At an early age, she was a ballerina. Dravić was known for her roles in "Destination Death", "Special Treatment", and "St. George Shoots the Dragon".
Dravić died on 14 October 2018 from pancreatic cancer in Belgrade at the age of 78.
